title: AskyBlock插件空岛插件
author: www1246507084
txt_content: AskyBlock插件怎么让玩家们在岛上自由PVP在别人的岛也可以的那种

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
plugins/ASkyBlock/config.yml设置成如下
protection:
   world:
     # Allow PVP in the overworld
     PVP: true复制代码

replies.author: www1246507084
replies.txt_content:
AzureHanChen 发表于 2020-1-16 18:19
plugins/ASkyBlock/config.yml设置成如下
还是提示就是目标处于禁止PVP区域
